mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASKET ( FAMILY_CUST_NO, PRODUCT_NO, BASKET_AMOUNT, REG_CUST_NO, REG_DT, REG_IP, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{familyCustNo}, #{productNo}, #{basketAmount}, #{regCustNo}, NOW(), #{regIp}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT B.PRODUCT_NO as productNo , B.BASKET_NO as basketNo , P.PRODUCT_NAME as productName , P.PRODUCT_CREDIT as productCredit , B.BASKET_AMOUNT as basketAmount , P.PRODUCT_CREDIT * B.BASKET_AMOUNT as totalCredit FROM BASKET B INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON B.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO AND P.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE FAMILY_CUST_NO = #{familyCustNo} AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE BASKET SET USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE FAMILY_CUST_NO = #{familyCustNo} AND USE_YN = 'W'
